duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide optimal guest experience services, assist guests in selecting merchandise, and demonstrate a high level of interest in the welfare, health, and proper handling of all animals.
Perform cashiering duties and related duties in support of the store's sales goal.
Ensure merchandise is properly stocked and priced, and adhere to operational guidelines and store policies.
Interact professionally and effectively with all professional contacts, providing prompt and courteous service to guests.
Assist in stocking and facing merchandise, complete cash register transactions, and perform housekeeping tasks to maintain the store's professional image.
Adhere to and promote established safety procedures and maintain a clean, safe, and healthy environment for store partners, guests, and animals.
Assist in the loading, unloading, and stocking of merchandise according to established procedures and participate in the completion of quarterly and annual physical inventory counts.
Ensure the health and well-being of live animals by providing correct care in accordance with Petco standards, policies, and procedures.
Assist store leadership in the opening/closing of the store as needed, including the accurate completion of required paperwork.
Perform routine housekeeping tasks and special projects as assigned.
